name: MLAStyle
0:
”Alexa, open m. l. a. Style.”
”Alexa, launch m. l. a. Style.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: m. l. a. style
des: This skill can help students refresh their m. l. a. citation skills. The m. l. a. Style skill can help with in-text citation for indirect sources, electronic sources and printed sources with known/unknown author. Also, Works Cited page for printed or electronic sources such as a website page. All information has been provided by Purdue OWL.
